metadata.dc:description: The last of a series presented by Dr. Estryn Behar which analyzes the influences architecture and working conditions may have on the health and quality of life of health care professionals. Concepts such as ergonomics, flexibility, architectural participation, etc., are shown to be essential to achieve a better environment for these workers.
metadata.dc:title: Ergonomia y salud en el trabajo (y IV). El caso de las profesionales hospitalarias.
[Occupational health and ergonomics. IV. Case of hospital professionals].
